[Elasticnode.net](https://www.elasticnode.net) provides free trial VPS servers for 3 days (€ 1 credit) to test out our services. All trial servers are **fully functional** and offer the same features as our production servers.

To grab this offer:

1. Sign up on our website, [https://www.elasticnode.net](https://www.elasticnode.net)
2. Link a valid credit card to your account.
3. Done! Your account will be credited €1 and you can spin up the servers you like.

Your card will not be charged and you can cancel at any time by destroying your VPS. We do not store your CC number, these are processed by Stripe.

We will provide this credit to the **first 50 accounts**.

After the trial period is over you can use coupon LOWENDTALK to get the server for €6.

If you have any questions about our service, please let us know!
